thread.title: Puneeth Rajkumar sings for SRK
thread.title_full: Puneeth Rajkumar sings for SRK - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Puneeth Rajkumar sings for SRK
text:
Now here's some brother love that always warms our hearts. Our sources have revealed to us that Power Star Puneeth Rajkumar recently finished recording a song for his brother, Shivarajkumar's upcoming film, Killing Veerappan. Helmed by Ram Gopal Varma , the audio of the bilingual movie is slated for release on October 25.
Puneeth has been crooning one hit song after the other, so we can't wait to hear this one.
